title: Wait so...
body:
Wtf is actually happening when I cast a Summoner Spell now?

Canonically, Summoners dont exist. I, the person playing my Champion, am no longer a Summoner leading my Champion, I am now playing as the Champion. My Champion does not Smite, my Champion does not Ignite, my Champion does not self cast Cleanse. Those were all things the Summoner did to assist their Champion in battle.

So if I am not raining down a Smite from the  sky, if I am not pointing my finger at Ashe and setting her ablaze with Ignite, then who or what the actual fuck is doing it?
